thread.title: Jamie O'Hara blasts ex-wife Danielle Lloyd as he compares Jasmine Waltz to her: 'She's absolutely crackers!'
thread.title_full: Jamie O'Hara blasts ex-wife Danielle Lloyd as he compares Jasmine Waltz to her: 'She's absolutely crackers!'

author: Hayley Minn
title: Jamie O'Hara blasts ex-wife Danielle Lloyd as he compares Jasmine Waltz to her: 'She's absolutely crackers!'
text:
Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Jamie O’Hara made a not-so-subtle dig at his ex-wife Danielle Lloyd in tonight’s Celebrity Big Brother, when he compared Jasmine Waltz to her. 
The previous night, Jasmine lashed out at Big Brother and fried her microphone in anger, after being forced to read out mean tweets about herself. 
And the former footballer was speaking to Danielle’s former friend Nicola McLean in the Channel 5 house about their housemate’s behaviour. 
Jamie commented: “I’ve got a thing for girls like that! Read More Jamie on CBB (Photo: Channel 5) Jamie (Photo: Channel 5) Jasmine (Photo: Channel 5) (Photo: James Gourley/REX/Shutterstock) 
“She reminds me a lot of Danielle…not in looks wise but the way she acts.” 
Nicola questioned: “Really? She doesn’t strike me to be like that!” 
But Jamie continued: “Yeah, on a night out she’s absolutely crackers. 
“When she’s had a few drinks, she’s crazy.” 
Jamie and Danielle were married until 2014 and have two sons Archie and Harry together. Read More Bianca Gascoigne, Jamie O'Hara (Photo: Rex Features) 
But it seems he’s been getting close to Bianca Gascoigne in the CBB house. 
Speaking in the Diary Room, he confessed: “Bianca is really nice, beautiful and competitive, I like that in a woman. I like her. 
“I’m holding back…she’s such a nice girl and down to earth. I really like that…I don’t know how she feels about me…” 
* Celebrity Big Brother continues on Channel 5 tomorrow at 9pm Like us on Facebook
